headline: UBS Lifts Applied Materials, Inc. (AMAT) Target, Reiterates Buy
summary: Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) is included among 12 Unstoppable Dividend Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 2, UBS analyst Timothy Arcuri raised his price recommendation on Applied Materials, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMAT) to $405 from $285. The analyst reiterated a Buy rating on the stock. The shares have climbed close to 80% over the past […]

headline: 3 Semiconductor Stocks with Open Questions
summary: Semiconductors are the picks and shovels of modern technology. The way we live and work is also changing with AI, which is creating secular demand for more powerful chips. As a result, the industry has seen solid stock price performance over the last six months as its gain of 64% has outpaced the S&P 500’s 6.6% return.

raw.headline: 3 Semiconductor Stocks with Open Questions
